value.string:
sale_packing_list_line = context
 software_instance = sale_packing_list_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type='Software Instance')
 computer_partition = sale_packing_list_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type=['Computer Partition', 'Slave Partition'])
 software_release = sale_packing_list_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type='Software Release')
 slave_id_list = []
 ip_list = []
 if computer_partition.getPortalType() == 'Computer Partition':
 slave_id_list = [slave_partition.getReference() for slave_partition in \
 computer_partition.contentValues(portal_type='Slave Partition') \
 if slave_partition.getSlapState() == 'busy']
 for internet_protocol_address in computer_partition.contentValues(portal_type='Internet Protocol Address'):
 ip_list.append((internet_protocol_address.getNetworkInterface(''), internet_protocol_address.getIpAddress()))
 if software_instance is not None and computer_partition is not None and software_release is not None:
 return {
 'xml':software_instance.getTextContent(),
 'connection_xml':software_instance.getConnectionXml(),
 'slap_computer_id':computer_partition.getParentValue().getReference(),
 'slap_computer_partition_id':computer_partition.getReference(),
 'slap_software_type': software_instance.getSourceReference(),
 'slap_software_release_url':software_release.getUrlString(),
 'slap_server_url':context.getPortalObject().portal_slap.absolute_url(),
 'slave_id_list':slave_id_list, # XXX: Is it really ok to send non string in instance xml dict?
 'ip_list':ip_list,
 }
 return None
